label: A5B6_hP22_163_abcf_i-001
title: Trigonal Cr$_{5}$S$_{6}$ Structure
comments: (Jellinek, 1957) also has data for trigonal Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$, which is generated from this structure by removing the Chromium atoms from the (2a) sites.  (Venkatraman, 1990) lists the structure Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$Cr, which is likely the same structure with possible vacancies on the (2a) sites.  There is also a \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_hR10_148_abc_f-001}{rhombohedral Cr$_{2}$S$_{3}$ structure} found in both references.
